title: UploadResult
description: Describes the result of a source upload processing.

checksum.description: Base64-encoded MD5 hash of the source package.

upload_id.description: Unique long-lived identifier for the upload processing result.

upload_compressed_size.description: Total compressed size of uploaded content.

lock_state.description: Indicates whether upload workspace may be updated. Normally used when important system process is processing upload files.

readiness.description: Status of the upload content. READY means content passed checks and did not raise any warnings/errors. Workspace content in READY or READY_WITH_WARNINGS state may be submitted. ERRORS indicate content has problems and will not be accepted.

start_datetime.description: The date-time when upload processing started.

completion_datetime.description: The date-time when processing upload completed.

source_format.description: The source format of the upload workspace.

public_filepath.description: File path reletaive to root of upload workspace source directory.

modified_datetime.description: Modified datetime in isoformat. Last modified time of file.

errors.description: Includes errors or other information that may be relevant for debugging upload issues. Each error will contain type of error [fatal/warn/info], a concise message, and optional file name.

items.description: Each error entry array contains level[WARN,FATAL,INFO], file (optional), and an appropriate message for the type of warning or error.
